div.p: The rainfall pattern (a) within and (b) between years at our study site: the Mweya Peninsula, Uganda. Panel (a) shows the mean (± standard error) rainfall recorded in each month ( n = 152 months, month 1 = January). Panel (b) shows the mean (filled circles and solid line) and standard deviation (open circles and dashed line) of the monthly rainfall within each year. Rainfall data for 2002 are incomplete and so not shown
